name: Attack
description: Deal 100% #POWICON# to frontmost enemy.

name: Reinforce
description: Beorn gains Reinforce.  Reinforce reduces damage taken from incoming attacks by 50%.

name: Riposte
description: Beorn gains Riposte.  Riposte negates the next incoming attack.  When consumed, Beorn will counterattack for 200% #POWICON#.

name: Phalanx
description: Beorn applies Phalanx to allies behind him. While Phalanx is active on an ally, it will transfer 25% of the next loss of health to Beorn.

name: Purity
description: Cedric gains Purity.  Purity increases max HP by 100% #POWICON#.

name: Righteousness
description: Cedric gains Righteousness.  While Righteousness is active, enemy attacks will be focused on Cedric.

name: Corruption
description: Cedric gains Corruption.  Corruption increases Cedric's #POWICON# by 10%, and reduces his max HP by 10%.

name: Blood Thrust
description: Grim deals 350% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy and Grim loses HP equal to 15% of his max HP.

name: Blood Bond
description: Grim deals 200% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy.  If the enemy has Necrosis, Grim will heal himself for 100% #POWICON#.

name: Blood Cleave
description: Grim deals 300% #POWICON# to the two frontmost enemies and Grim loses HP equal to 15% of his max HP.

name: Cleave
description: Lambug deals 200% #POWICON# to the two frontmost enemies.

name: Overexertion
description: Lambug deals 400% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy and then gains Tired.  Tired reduces damage done by Overexertion by 30% per stack.

name: Amped Up
description: Lambug gains Rested and deals 250% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy.  Rested increases Lambug's Power by 15% per stack. Rested is removed when Lambug is attacked.

name: Meteor
description: Zoe deals 75% #POWICON# to all enemies and applies Scorch.  Scorch deals 10% #POWICON# to enemies on their turn.

name: Conflagrate
description: Zoe deals 250% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy and applies Scorch.  Scorch deals 10% #POWICON# to enemies on their turn.

name: Apocalypse
description: Zoe focuses her energy for three rounds.  On the third round, Zoe deals 1000% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy.

name: Frost Strike
description: Neve attacks the frontmost enemy for 100% #POWICON# and applies Chilled.  If they are already Chilled,  this attack does 250% #POWICON# instead.

name: Snowstorm
description: Neve deals 60% #POWICON# to all enemies and applies Chilled.

name: Deep Freeze
description: Neve becomes immune to all damage until her next turn.

name: Decay
description: Titus saps life energy from the ally in front of him to apply Necrosis on his enemy counterpart. Necrosis deals 30% #POWICON# per stack to enemies on their turn. Titus will not sap Grim.

name: Decompose
description: Titus saps life energy from the ally behind him to apply Necrosis on his enemy counterpart. Necrosis deals 30% #POWICON# per stack to enemies on their turn. Titus will not sap Grim.

name: Disintegrate
description: Titus applies Necrosis to all enemies and allies. Necrosis deals 30% #POWICON# per stack to enemies on their turn. Titus and Grim will not be affected.

name: Restore
description: Troy heals the ally missing the most HP for 100% #POWICON#.

name: Rejuvenate
description: Troy heals all allies for 75% #POWICON#.

name: Regen
description: Troy applies Regen to the frontmost ally.  Regen heals for 35% #POWICON# on their turn.

name: Paeon
description: Alok applies Paeon to all allies.  Paeon increases max HP by 200% #POWICON#.

name: Madrigal
description: Alok applies Madrigal to all allies. Madrigal increases Power by 25% #POWICON#.

name: Requiem
description: Alok applies Requiem to all enemies. Requiem doubles damage taken for the next attack received.

name: Snipe
description: Grogmar deals 200% #POWICON# to the lowest HP enemy.  If that enemy is below 50% health, Grogmar deals 300% #POWICON# instead.

name: Flare
description: Grogmar deals 200% #POWICON# to the third enemy.  If they are Scorched, Grogmar deals 400% #POWICON# instead and removes Scorched.

name: Incapacitate
description: Grogmar deals 100% #POWICON# to the fourth enemy.  If they are at full HP, Grogmar deals 350% #POWICON# instead.

name: Double Tap
description: Revere deals 100% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy twice.

name: Cold Cuts
description: Revere deals 200% #POWICON# to the second enemy.  If they are Chilled, Revere deals 400% #POWICON# instead.

name: Lucky Stab
description: Revere deals 300% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy.  If Revere's HP ends in a 7, Revere deals 700% #POWICON# instead.

name: Direct Hit
description: Caeda applies Marked to the second enemy.  Allies will focus their attacks on marked targets.

name: Dead Center
description: Caeda applies Marked to the third enemy. Allies will focus their attacks on marked targets.

name: Bulls Eye
description: Caeda applies Marked to the fourth enemy.  Allies will focus their attacks on marked targets.

name: Swift Strike
description: Elf Adventurer deals 75% damage to the frontmost enemy and heals all allies for the damage dealt.

name: Regenerate
description: Green Ooze heals itself for 200% #POWICON#.

name: Wilt
description: Minimush deals 100% #POWICON# and applies Wilt to frontmost enemy.  Wilt reduces healing received by 50%.

name: Full Force
description: Bumbling Bee deals 200% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy.  If Bumbling Bee is at full health, it deals 300% #POWICON# instead.

name: Sure Shot
description: Elf Scout deals 200% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy.  If they have a buff, Elf Scout deals 400% #POWICON# instead.

name: Healing Spores
description: Maximush heals itself for 100% #POWICON#.  If Maximush is below 50% health, Maximush heals for 150% #POWICON# instead.

name: Gloop Glop
description: For any ally who has debuffs, Pink Ooze removes their debuffs and heals them for 75% #POWICON#.

name: Antisymbiosis
description: Wiggle Worm deals 100% #POWICON# to frontmost enemy.  If Wiggle Worm is missing any HP, it deals 300% damage instead.

name: Holy Radiation
description: Elf Mender heals adjacent allies for 100% #POWICON#.

name: Deadly Web
description: Scary Spider deals 100% #POWICON# to the fourth enemy.  If Scary Spider is at full health, it deals 300% #POWICON# instead.

name: Translucent
description: Blinkie gains Translucent.  Translucent reduces damage from the next attack by 100%.

name: Purge
description: Earth Shaman removes all debuffs from all allies.  Earth Shaman deals 100% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy for each debuff removed.

name: Overpower
description: Violet Death deals 200% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy target.  If the target is below 50% health, Violet Death deals 300% #POWICON# instead.

name: Helping Hand
description: Flood heals the ally missing the most HP for 150% #POWICON#.

name: Lightning Storm
description: Lightning Shaman deals 100% #POWICON# to all enemies.

name: Phased
description: Stinkie gains Phased. Phased negates all damage taken until Stinkie's next turn.

name: Life Seed
description: Cyan Curse heals all allies for 75% #POWICON#. If Cyan Curse is at full HP, it heals for 150% #POWICON# instead.

name: Avalanche
description: Rockfall reduces all enemy's HP to 50% of their max HP. This skill has no effect on enemies who have less than full HP.

name: Evasion
description: Smokie applies Evasion to all allies. Evasion negates the next incoming attack.

name: Ignition
description: Blaze deals 100% #POWICON# to all enemies. If Blaze is at full HP, it deals 200% #POWICON# instead.

name: Lasers
description: Dusty Alien deals 300% #POWICON# to the frontmost enemy.

name: Crab Hammer
description: Crusty Crab deals damage to the frontmost enemy equal to 25% of their max HP.

name: Viking Smash
description: Dwarf Minor deals 300% #POWICON# to the backmost enemy.

name: Stronger Together
description: Femur Fred heals itself for 100% #POWICON#. For each additional alive ally (excluding itself), the heal is increased by 50% #POWICON#.

name: Jarls Blessing
description: Dwarf Sentry applies Jarls Blessing to each adjacent ally.  Jarls Blessing increases their #POWICON# by 20% of Dwarf Sentry's #POWICON#.

name: Shellstopper
description: Tepid Turtle gains Shellstopper.  Shellstopper reduces damage taken from incoming attacks by 25%.

name: Fragment Bone
description: Johnny Jaw explodes, dealing 600% #POWICON# to all enemies and reducing its HP to 0.

name: Execute
description: Creepy Alien deals 300% #POWICON# to the enemy with the lowest HP.

name: Dwarvish Prayer
description: Dwarf Magus heals the ally in front of itself for 150% #POWICON#.

name: Ten Tickles
description: Obese Octopus deals 200% #POWICON# to all enemies.  If Obese Octopus is not at full health, it deals 400% #POWICON# instead.

name: Bonesplosion
description: Larry Jr explodes, dealing 300% #POWICON# to all enemies.

name: Bone Up
description: Larry Jr pulls himself by the bonestraps and regenerates to full HP.

name: Sleepytime
description: Maybe he's doing yoga?

name: Uhhh... Photosynthesis?
description: Literally just a tree.  Might eventually process sunlight in an attempt synthesize foods from carbon dioxide and water.

name: Load Bearing
description: Trees are strong.  You won't do much damage to them.

name: Provoke The Mighty
description: Might Hero attacks will be focused on Czerwony.  Czerwony will not be attacked by other hero types.  Upon his death, Czerwony will grant "Take My Shield!" to the Goblin King.  Take My Shield reduces damage taken from every third attack by 100%, and deals double damage to Might heroes.

name: Provoke The Mind
description: Mind Hero attacks will be focused on Niebieski.  Niebieski will not be attacked by other hero types.  Upon her death, Niebieski will grant "Take My Staff!" to the Goblin King.  Take My Staff heals the Goblin King on his turn, and deals double damage to Mind heroes.

name: Provoke The Moxie
description: Moxie Hero attacks will be focused on Zielony.  Zielony will not be attacked by other hero types.  Upon their death, Zielony will grant "Take My Knife!" to the Goblin King.  Take My Knife causes the Goblin King's regular attacks to damage the lowest HP enemy, and deal double damage to Moxie heroes.

name: Moxie Smash
description: Czerwony attacks the nearest Moxie Hero for 800% #POWICON#.  If no Moxie Heroes are available, Czerwony deals 200% #POWICON# instead.

name: Goblin Swipe
description: Czerwony deals 200% #POWICON# to the two frontmost enemies.

name: Mighty Blast
description: Niebieski deals 200% #POWICON# to all enemies.  Might Heroes take an additional 200% #POWICON#.

name: Healing Aura
description: Niebieski heals all allies for 200% #POWICON#.

name: Mind Sniper
description: Zielony deals 200% #POWICON# to the lowest HP enemy.  If that enemy is a Mind Hero, Zielony deals an addtional 200% #POWICON#.

name: Weaken Foes
description: Zielony applies Weaken Foes to all enemies.  Weaken Foes increases damage taken by 1.5x for the next attack received.

name: Tree Wallop
description: Loathing Oak deals 700% #POWICON# to the second enemy.

name: Prickly Personality
description: Caddish Cactus deals 20% #POWICON# to an enemy when they attack it.

name: Needle Barrage
description: Caddish Cactus deals 250% #POWICON# to the front two enemies.

name: Forgotten Wish
description: Distribution Djinn reallocates all enemies' HP to be equal.

name: Decay
description: Lich King Larry deals damage to all enemies equal to 2% of their max HP.

name: Bonerang
description: Lich King Larry deals 200% #POWICON# to the two lowest max HP enemy units.

name: Bone Down
description: Larry Jr turns into a pile of bones when his health is reduced to 0 as long as Lich King Larry is alive.

name: Blank Canvas
description: Paintbrush Knight attacks an enemy unit in order for 100% #POWICON# and absorbs their type.

name: Masterpiece
description: Paintbrush Knight attacks and performs an action based off its type - Might: Gain stacking self protective shield. Mindful: Heal self and gain a % heal buff. Moxious: Add debuff on enemy to take additional damage.

name: Rising Phoenix
description: Once below 25% HP, Cinder Phoenix will turn into an egg and attempt to revitalize itself.

name: Phoenix Fire
description: Cinder Phoenix applies Phoenix Fire on all enemy units.  Phoenix Fire deals 14% #POWICON# on the target's turn.

name: Hibernate
description: Cinder Phoenix is resting.

name: Rise
description: Cinder Phoenix returns to original form at full HP.

name: Knife Throw
description: Monkey deals 200% to frontmost enemy. Monkey then deals 200% #POWICON# to all enemies and an additional 10% damage done for each banana found (banana for scale).

name: Bananadine
description: Monkey deals 200% to frontmost enemy. Monkey then heals self for 200% #POWICON# and an additional 40% healing done for each banana found (banana for scale).

name: Banana Find
description: Monkey is looking for bananas in the trees, hopefully stored away from heat and light, or someone will have to make bread in a few days.

name: Snack Break
description: Monkey occasionally becomes hungry, and will hunt for food.  All negative status effects will be removed.

name: Tentacle Whip
description: Krakoptopus deals 200% #POWICON# to frontmost enemy, 150% #POWICON# to second enemy, 100% #POWICON# to third enemy, and 50% #POWICON# to fourth enemy

name: Mind Control
description: Krakoptopus applies Mind Control to a random enemy.  Mind Control gains control of this hero's next special skill, using it against their team or for his benefit.

name: Cold Blooded
description: Krakoptopus applies Cold Blooded.  Cold Blooded negates damage received from enemies on the next attack, and heals Krakoptopus for an equal amount instead.

name: Kingpin
description: Goblin King gains a stack of Kingpin and gains a special buff every time another goblin dies.  Only one special buff can be active at a time.

name: Rapid Strikes
description: Goblin King attacks the frontmost enemy for 100% #POWICON#.  Goblin King will attack that enemy again for each stack of Kingpin.

name: Gutter Punch
description: Goblin King attacks the frontmost enemy unit for 200% #POWICON#.  Goblin King will attack an additional unit for each stack of Kingpin.

name: Attack
description: Deal 100% #POWICON# to frontmost enemy. If Goblin King has "Take My Knife!" buff, this attack deals damage to the lowest HP enemy instead.

name: Confuse Ray
description:
Beclutcher gains a stack of Watchful Eye and performs one of four actions on an intelligently picked target:
- Deals 100% #POWICON# to target enemy, and advances their playbook forward one skill;
- Deals 100% #POWICON# to target enemy, and set their playbook back one skill;
- Deals 100% #POWICON# to target enemy, and add/remove a buff that reverses the order their playbook advances, or;
- If Beclutcher has 7 stacks of Watchful Eye, Beclutcher will instantly kill their target.
